[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [FASTElementDefinition](../fast-element.fastelementdefinition/index.html)

## FASTElementDefinition class

Defines metadata for a FASTElement.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FASTElementDefinition<TType extends Constructable<HTMLElement> = Constructable<HTMLElement>> 
```
